title: Cloak of Dragons
description: My name is Nadia, and I’m an errand girl.Except my boss is the High Queen of the Elves.And my errands for her involve spying on people. Or stealing things. Or hunting down monsters. Or, on occasion, killing people.But this time she wants me to solve a murder.And unless I find the killer, I’m going to be his next target…because dragons never forgive a murder.
author: Jonathan Moeller
